cont.entity_a: Super low light performance with image stabilization for indoor photos without flash.
cont.entity_b: Great in low light, rarely need a flash.

cont.entity_a: Focal range covers wide angle to mid-range telephoto, ideal for walk-around use.
AF is super fast and tack sharp.
Heavier and larger than the kit lens.
cont.entity_b: The lens is compact and fast.

cont.entity_a: Sharp photos in all lighting situations, including low light. Image quality comparable to L series lenses.
cont.entity_b: The 50mm is sharper than the 28mm in terms of image quality. Sharp at all apertures. Images are true to life with no distortion.
Not sharp at f/1.8, sharpens from f/2.8.
Build quality is solid, comparable to L lenses.

cont.entity_a: Images are sharp with nice colors, quick and accurate focus.
cont.entity_b: Fast autofocus and good in low light.
The 28mm lens is silent and smooth compared to the noisy 50mm.

cont.entity_a: Requires frequent cleaning due to dust issue.
cont.entity_b: Slight wear and tear expected in used lens.
Good for handheld videos due to compactness.

cont.entity_a: Excellent for low-light and portraits, great depth of field.
cont.entity_b: Produces nice bokeh and sharp images.
Images are true to life with no distortion.
Some chromatic aberration present, fixable in post-processing.
